text: Miguel Ángel Revilla Roiz (born 23 January 1943) is a Spanish politician, economist and bank employee. He was the 9th President of the Autonomous Community of Cantabria. Before this, Revilla has was the 7th President between 2003 and 2011. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Presidents of Cantabria Category:Living people
title: Miguel Ángel Revilla
